biotools.summary: Providides pre-estimated effective sample sizes, specific to each minor allele frequency (MAF) category, for designs with arbitrary coverage (0.5 - 30X) and sample size (20-20,000), and for four major ethnic groups (Europeans, Africans, Asians and African Americans).
